Wide Window Zoom is a user-friendly web extension that enhances your browsing experience on ultra-wide screens by automatically adjusting page zoom levels. If you have a large, wide monitor or use multiple displays, this extension is tailored to make web content more legible and visually comfortable.

The extension detects when your browser window reaches a certain width threshold. Upon detection, Wide Window Zoom smoothly applies a customizable zoom level to the entire page, ensuring that texts are scaled appropriately for optimal readability and visibility.

Key Features:

- Customizable width threshold
- Customizable Zoom Level
- Seamless Interaction: The extension works seamlessly in the background.
- Responsive Design Consideration: The extension avoids increases text sizes without altering responsive websites.
- Blacklist: The extension can be disabled on specific websites.

Wide Window Zoom is your perfect companion for ultra-wide screen setups, helping you make the most of your expansive display real estate without straining your eyes. Say goodbye to squinting at tiny text or constant manual zoom adjustments and enjoy a more pleasant and immersive browsing experience with Wide Window Zoom!
